title: Behind The Idea #75: Cars.com's Value Running Out Of Gas
description: We break down a short idea from Seeking Alpha contributor BOOX Research on this week's Behind the Idea. The stock? Cars.com (CARS), a legacy media company spun off and trying to make it in a competitive web-driven world. The multiple is low, but is it low enough?
itunes:title: Cars.com's Value Running Out Of Gas
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We visit the fraught habitat of a value trap and see whether investors can make it out whole.
itunes:summary: We break down a short idea from Seeking Alpha contributor BOOX Research on this week's Behind the Idea. The stock? Cars.com (CARS), a legacy media company spun off and trying to make it in a competitive web-driven world. The multiple is low, but is it low enough?
